title: Microphone keeps losing connection
steps: On the reciever, lower the squelch level. This might allow weaker signals to be recieved.
Scan and change the frequency to a more stable signal on the reciever and then sync it to the microphone.
If possible, elevate the reciever to a higher position or swap antenna for longer ones.
Swap the microphone for a different one, if available.

title: Microphone is Clipping
steps: Lower the gain on the microphone reciever or on the microphone itself.
Lower the gain on the mixer or add a pad to the signal (mixer specific)
